item.title: Working with APIs: Cryptocurrencies
item.description: Introduction API for Cryptocurrencies & Getting the Data Plotting the Data Introduction Working with APIs is a really powerful way to get new data you can work with. Especially if you want to make some personal projects by yourself or with friends/colleagues. However, to get full access to the data with an API, you will need to pay for it in most cases. I would like to show you a very simple way to work with APIs.
